DonationItem.title: DonationItem
DonationItem.description: Represents an item that a user wants to donate.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DonationItem entity.

userId.description: Reference to User who is donating the item. (Relationship: User 1:N DonationItem)

type.description: The type of item being donated (e.g., clothes, books, furniture).

description.description: A detailed description of the item.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DonationPoint entity.

name.description: The name of the donation point (e.g., 'Salvation Army', 'Local Church').

address.description: The address of the donation point.

openingHours.description: The opening hours of the donation point.

acceptedItemTypes.description: A list of item types accepted at this donation point.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the donation point.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the donation point.

definition.description: Stores donation points. Access is public.

params.name: donationPointId
params.description: The unique ID of the donation point.
